body_html:
I’m reluctant to see this PR merged; I’m not sure if TF uses CUDA Runtime API in tensorflow/core (is it linked at all?)

It seems the stream executor package is supposed to replace the proprietary CUDA Runtime API.

body:
I’m reluctant to see this PR merged; I’m not sure if TF uses CUDA Runtime API in tensorflow/core (is it linked at all?)

It seems the stream executor package is supposed to replace the proprietary CUDA Runtime API.
